trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK110_04560_SEQ_00<tab>Maru hopes you will be amenable to acquiring anemones.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK110_04560_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the redbloom anemones to Maru.
TEXT_BANARK110_04560_MARU_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you be willin' to go scrape me up some redbloom anemones? There's this recipe I wanna try...
TEXT_BANARK110_04560_MARU_000_001<tab>You'll wanna look just off the coast of Saltwind's Welcome. If you could grab me a couple growin' close to the water's surface, I'd be much obliged.

TEXT_BANARK110_04560_MARU_000_011<tab>These're them! Redblooms are universal─fishers use 'em for moochin', and they're delicious deep-fried or steamed in coconut milk. With fronds like these, who needs other anemones?
TEXT_BANARK110_04560_MARU_000_012<tab>...A-Anyway, since they're so popular, you're only allowed to harvest 'em from certain areas. Don't wanna get too greedy, after all...
